title: Perform a Thematic Audit
description: The Chief Audit Executive requests a thematic audit focusing on the use of consultants across the entire organization.

tasks.description: Scope the audit to cover consultant hiring, performance management, and invoice processing across all major departments.
tasks.expected_outcome: A cross-functional audit scope is defined.

tasks.description: Obtain data from HR and Accounts Payable to create a complete picture of consultant usage and spend for the past year.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive dataset on consultant activity is compiled.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify themes, such as a lack of a centralized process for hiring consultants or inconsistent invoice approval processes across departments.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit identifies systemic, company-wide issues in how consultants are managed.
